all_things_in_murderation

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • all_things_in_murderation.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    The Room class has a name, description, list of items in it and list of exits leading To other rooms and the associated ImageIcon
    Author:
    Nodar Sotkilava, Hal Stewart, Emily Pochet

      • getItemsList

        public java.lang.String getItemsList()
        Returns items' names in the room
        Returns:
        If no items in the room, returns null else returns the list of items

      • getExitsList

        public java.lang.String getExitsList()
        Returns the exits in the room
        Returns:
        If no exits in the room, returns null else returns list of exits with their description and direction

      • get_item

        public Item get_item(java.lang.String s)
        Returns an item from the room and removes in from the room's item list
        Parameters:
        s - Passed item's name
        Returns:
        If item's name matches item's name in the room then returns that item and deletes it from room's list of items else null

      • get_exit

        public Exit get_exit(java.lang.String s)
        Returns the exit in the room
        Parameters:
        s - Passed exit's name
        Returns:
        If exit's name matches the exit's name in the room then returns that exit else null
